summary: This dispatch discusses Tadeusz SZULC, including information from SMEDICEVA's traces and Ignacy SACHS's activities. It details SZULC's past pro-communist activities, his relationship with SACHS, and his efforts to gain employment in American press circles. The document also includes information on SACHS's roles and activities, as well as SZULC's contacts and reports to the Polish Legation.
title: SMEDIFY Information Concerning Tadeusz SZULC
recipient: Chief of Station, Rio de Janeiro
